Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.User

Class CliController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.User.CliController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class CliController
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface
Cli Class contains all methods needed to show and parse the player's input into an Action object to be sent to the Server.

Attributes:

  • Scanner "sc": takes input from the player
  • boolean "firstLeaderCard": used to store information regarding a production activation
  • boolean "secondLeaderCard": used to store information regarding a production activation
  • boolean "basicProduction": used to store information regarding a production activation

  • Constructor Summary

    • nextAction

      public void nextAction​(UserInteraction userInteraction, UIActions action)
      Sets a new UIAction inside the UserInteraction to set the action which the player has to perform.
      Specified by:
      nextAction in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      userInteraction - object containing all View information.
      action - UIAction to be set.

    • displayAction

      public void displayAction​(UserInteraction userInteraction)
      Displays an Action performed by a player connected to the server. If the player calling the method is the one who has to play his turn, a new CLI interaction is started.
      Parameters:
      userInteraction - object containing all View information.

    • displayServerError

      public void displayServerError​(UserInteraction userInteraction)
      Displays an error which occurred after a player tried to perform an Action on the server. If the player calling the method is the one who has to play his turn, a new CLI interaction is started.
      Parameters:
      userInteraction - object containing all View information.

    • initial

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> initial()
      Method used on startup by the client (if in Cli mode) to print the game title and get the Server address and port as input from the user.
      Specified by:
      initial in interface UserInterface
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Objects containing the address String and the port int.

    • initialChooseLeaderCards

      public Action initialChooseLeaderCards​(RedLeaderCard[] leaderCardsArray) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Makes the user choose his initial Leader Cards.
      Parameters:
      leaderCardsArray - Array of Leader Cards sent by the Server containing the Leader Cards to choose from.
      Returns:
      An InitChooseLeaderCard action.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the array sent by the Server is not of length 4.

    • initialChooseResources

      public Action initialChooseResources​(int resources)
      Makes the user choose is initial resources.
      Parameters:
      resources - int sent by the Server indicating the number of total resources to choose.
      Returns:
      An InitialChooseResources action.

    • actionPicker

      public Action actionPicker​(Game game) throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
      actionPicker method is used by the player to choose which action he wants to perform.
      Parameters:
      game - Current game being played by the Player
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Player does not have any Possible Action left.

    • finalPoints

      public void finalPoints​(Game game)
      Shows a final message containing Victory Points of all players of the Game.

      The user is also informed about whether he lost or won.

      Parameters:
      game - Game from which to gather all players' Victory Points.

    • finalSingleplayer

      public void finalSingleplayer​(Game game, boolean youWon)
      Shows a final message containing Victory Points on a Singleplayer Game.

      The user is also informed about whether he lost or won.

      Parameters:
      game - Game from which to gather all players' Victory Points.
      youWon - boolean indicating whether the player lost or won.

      Parameters:
      leaderCards - ArrayList containing Leader Cards to be displayed.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings which contains graphical information.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs while saving the Cards' CLI graphics
